# Purchase of One Microscope with DIC
### (Request for Proposal)
### Solicitation No. 01B46-23-171
#### Harmonized Simplified Test Questionnaire ID: 473-29457797 (Amendment 5)

**Purchase Overview**

The Department of Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada (AAFC) is seeking a proposal for the purchase of one (1) Microscope with DIC for nematode inspections. The microscope will be used at the London Research and Development Center, located at 4902 Victoria Avenue North, Vineland, Ontario.

**Key Details**

- **Solicitation Number**: 01B46-23-171
- **Harmonized Simplified Test Questionnaire ID**: 473-29457797 (Amendment 5)
- **Amendment Date**: 2023-12-11
- **Publication Date**: 2023-11-02
- **Tender Closing Date**: 2023-12-11T14:00:00 (Central Standard Time)

**Description of Requirement**

The procurement requires the purchase of a single microscope with DIC to support nematode inspections at the AAFC's London Research and Development Center.

**Evaluation Criteria and Method**

This procurement will be awarded to the bidder offering the lowest price.

**Trade Agreements and Government Procurement Policy Requirements**

This procurement is covered under the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).

**Delivery and Performance**

- The microscope will be delivered to the AAFC's London Research and Development Center.
- The delivery date is expected to be within 30 days of the contract award date.

**Required Documents and Attachments**

Refer to the attached [link](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/23835/npp-apm.pdf) for detailed information.

**Contact**
- Procurement Officer: Marie-Pier Parent
  - Email: marie-pier.parent@agr.gc.ca
  - Phone: (+1) 1506 5317263
